bibl.title: P. Artemid.: The Artefact.
bibl.note: P. Artemid. (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). "A product of amalgamation of disparate materials by scribes and draftsmen practising diverse elements: the copying of texts (rhetorical, technical), cartographic, portraiture, paradoxographic sketches. These elements appear to be a series of trials, perhaps in conjunction for training in the production of the sort of book-roll that many have assumed P. Artemid. to be."

bibl.title: Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008)

bibl.seg: OBBINK Dirk, P. Artemid.: The Artefact.

Kai BRODERSEN and Ja≈õ ELSNER (Edd.), Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008) = Historia. Einzelschriften. 214 (Stuttgart, 2009) pp. 11-17.

P. Artemid. (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). "A product of amalgamation of disparate materials by scribes and draftsmen practising diverse elements: the copying of texts (rhetorical, technical), cartographic, portraiture, paradoxographic sketches. These elements appear to be a series of trials, perhaps in conjunction for training in the production of the sort of book-roll that many have assumed P. Artemid. to be."
